name: Traveling Through Time and Space to Become an Unlucky NPC: I Have a Wife to Protect Me
author: 英之耀
content: He Qingyang traveled to the game &quotSword Immortal Legend&quot he was playing and became an unlucky NPC who kept skipping the plot when he was playing the game. This NPC kept harassing the main heroine Ning Yiwan, and later his identity was exposed and he was killed by Ning Yiwan.....
